description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing several HTTP GET endpoints including a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the notesbackend application, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI, constructing the URL based on the current request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns basic application info.
